name: Bald's Basics Remastered
description:
Welcome to.. uh bald's basics remastered? Oh yeah! remember Bald? welp he's back once again but with a remastered version! There are also multiple maps but sadly they don't work (that means they don't load) (I only duplicated the startbutton script and edited it in visual studio, putted the the script in the custom modes. but without function. If anyone can help, please tell me) Anyways here are the credits:

Porky powers for open source (y'know im kinda getting tired of crediting him (not trying to be rude))

Heavily inspired by  Baldi want fruit gummy

JSP for the Basketball student music.

Xanderstar for his fruit gummy character.

Haderp for the baldi model

Wowzaboimodder for the student model.

i think that's it!
